pullrequest.title: Resolution option functionality for semi-supervised mode

content.raw: A line by line intention-based comments would be far more helpful then the long description above. It's hard to keep it all in your hard as you only read 5 lines below. In general I would try to remove as much as possible and keep the comments as temporal/close as possible to the code that needs some sort of justification/explanation.

In general I would try to remove as much as possible and keep the comments as temporal/close as possible to the code that needs some sort of justification/explanation.
